channel.title: Steam link
channel.description:
Yo dawg, new to forum and all dat.
I was just wondering how you link the steam community page info thingy to people's profiles. Trying to start up a forum with a few mates and trying to make it as good as possible ^_^
The steam thing is usually top right of some one's post.
Thanks

item.title: Steam link
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
Thanks man, i’ll check them out

Read full topic

item.title: Steam link
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Ok, well if you use SMF, I wrote a mod that adds in into the postbit (Left of post where username etc is and the user profile), although it is outdated now.
If you use MyBB, I am writing a plugin that adds it to the top right of the post.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam link
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
Nothing as of yet, we’re still designing all the systems and pages.
Any suggestions would help a bundle

Read full topic

item.title: Steam link
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
This forum uses https://code.google.com/p/steamprofile/, but there are a billion other ones that do the same thing.

Installation varies depending on what forum platform you are using.
What are you using? - I may be able to help.

Read full topic
